description: Contains actions performed on or with lists of service providers provided to a patient. Actions can include things like printing the list, and scanning a list back in after the patient has indicated their preference.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: SEARCH_LIST_IDENT
columns.description: An ID for the list of service providers that the result is a part of. This column is frequently used to link to the PAT_SVC_PROV_SEARCH_LIST table.

columns.name: SERV_PROV_LIST_ACT_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the type of action that was performed on the list of service providers


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Printed


Sent Electronically


Revoked Electronically


Reviewed Electronically

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who performed the action on the service provider list.

columns.name: ACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The time the action was performed on the service provider list.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: A document that was printed or scanned for the patient preference list generated in the Patient Choice navigator section.

columns.name: LIST_PRINT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the print job if the action type is Printed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In progress


Printing failed


Completed
